title: So i cant use ornns base skin
body:
I purchased the pack that comes with ornn and the skin and now i cant use ornns base skin. Also going to throw this in here, ornns quickshop bar covers the debuffs at times.
Restarted my client and that fixed it!

replies.body: I noticed this myself this morning! Kinda freaked me out for a second because I hadn't actually bought the skin yet, so it was odd that the client was telling me the ONLY skin I had available was locked. As it turns out, this is just a visual bug and you will still be able to use his base skin if you wish.
